addr: 4688 Eagle Rock Blvd Los Angeles, CA 90041
title: New Moon Sound Bath with Jamie Ford
desc: Join us at the only Sound Bath Studio in Los Angeles!?Sound Baths at the Sound Space are?a special experience ? space is limited to 10 people?so it?s an?intimate group.? The entire solar system of gongs and a variety of bowls will be played so it?s truly a celestial experience! The new moon is the start of the lunar month ? and a wonderful time to set intentions and goals. So lay back, relax and allow the sounds to assist you in bringing your intentions into form! **Please bring a mat, blanket, and anything else you may need to be comfortable laying on the concrete floor. Mats are not provided at this time. Advanced registration required , space limited to 10.? Your payment reserves your spot, unless otherwise stated by Jamie, 48 hour cancellation notice is required to receive credit towards?an approved similar event within 3 months.?Please arrive on time. Sound Bath begins approximately 10 minutes after scheduled start time and doors are locked once we begin.
